questions.question: What is the empirical formula of NU-109E?
What temperature were the single crystals of NU-109E and NU-110E mounted in oil on glass fibers and placed in the nitrogen cold stream?
What is the crystal system of NU-110E?
What method was used to correct all data for absorption in the X-ray crystallography analyses of MOFs NU-109E and NU-110E?
Is the space group for NU-109E and NU-110E the same?
What force field was used for the bonded and the short range non-bonded interactions between the atoms in the molecular mechanics simulations for predicting NU-109SP and NU-110SP structures?
What was the probe diameter used in the geometric surface area calculations of MOF series A, B, and C?
Did the experimental N2 adsorption and desorption isotherms for NU-109E at 77 K show a step in the isotherm?
What was the highest possible accessible surface area estimated for MOF series C?
Was the cubic unit cell side length for each series of MOFs A, B, and C calculated based on the distance between the centers of the central and terminal phenyl groups of the linker?
What software was used for the grand canonical Monte Carlo (GCMC) simulations to estimate the adsorption isotherms of N2 in NU-109SE/109SP and NU-110SE/110SP?
What was the method used for deriving partial atomic charges for the DFT calculations?
Did the simulated N2 isotherms of NU-110SE used for calculating the BET surface areas show changes of slope in the low-pressure region due to successive filling of the different sized cavities?
What was the yield calculated from the evacuated sample for the synthesis of NU-110E based on LH6-2?
What was the crystal system used for the prediction of NU-109SP and NU-110SP structures?
Was the activation of the sample for N2 gas adsorption measurements done via supercritical CO2 drying (SCD)?
What was the final optimized cubic unit cell dimensions of NU-109SP?
What was the probe diameter equal to in the geometric surface area calculations?
questions.answer: The van der Waals diameter of nitrogen, which is 3.72 Å

questions.question: Was the space group for both NU-109E and NU-110E Fm 3 m?
What was the method used for sample activation before gas adsorption measurements?
